mapper.select: SELECT PAY_ID AS payId, PAY_ORDERINFO AS payOrderinfo, PAY_USERID AS payUserid, PAY_MONEY AS payMoney, PAY_TYPE AS payType, PAY_TIME AS payTime, PAY_STATE AS payState FROM pay WHERE (pay_time between date (#{startDate}) and date (#{endDate})) AND (pay_userid=#{userId})
